tool_description: Extracts and structures review content from various input formats, normalizing data for downstream moderation analysis.

review_data.description: Raw review data in JSON string format containing review content and metadata

extract_fields.description: List of fields to extract from review data

error_messages: Invalid review data format: Provide valid JSON string containing review information
Missing required fields: At least one field from extract_fields must be present in review_data
Empty extraction fields: extract_fields array cannot be empty
usage: Pass raw review data as JSON string and specify which fields to extract. Returns structured review content ready for moderation analysis.

extracted_content.description: Structured review content as JSON string
